meanings.sent1: The noncommutative operations in math do not follow a specific order.
meanings.sent2: In this noncommutative system, the order of actions matters.
meanings.sent3: The noncommutative puzzle was tricky because the pieces had to be placed in a specific sequence.
meanings.sent4: Her noncommutative approach to problem-solving turned everything upside down.
meanings.sent5: The noncommutative nature of the game made it challenging and exciting.

meanings.sent1: The noncommutative properties of the items made them unique and irreplaceable.
meanings.sent2: These noncommutative tokens cannot be swapped for others.
meanings.sent3: The noncommutative keys could only open their designated locks.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like a noncommutative bond that couldn't be broken.
meanings.sent5: The noncommutative nature of their friendship made it special and unrepeatable.
